data.message: Hello @Facebook. The ability to tag my pages, or any page, including yours, is impossible. This just started happening since I made the update for the Facebook app. I'm very disappointed and its hurting my businesses! Could you please tell me what I can do to resolve this issue?

replies.message: Hi Paulina. Please help our team track this issue by reporting it with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2crneiW. Thanks. -Jessica
Where can I make a complaint about Facebook allowing videos of women being STONED to death on people's feeds?
